summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly elevated and TDS is fluctuating.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding pH-lowering agents to maintain optimal levels for tilapia.
Monitor TDS closely; consider water changes if it continues to rise.
Ensure adequate aeration and shading to prevent overheating.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 327.015 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.347 / 23.56 / 29.5 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
